name: Transfer list
description: A transfer list or shuttle enables the user to move one or more list items between lists.

properties.name: disabled
properties.label: Disabled
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to disable a component.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to disable a component.

properties.name: listType
properties.label: List Type
properties.handlerDescription: This property allows you to select a list type of Basic or Enhanced.
properties.settingTooltip: This property allows you to select a list type of Basic or Enhanced.

properties.name: leftItems
properties.label: Left Items
properties.handlerDescription: Please enter the items to be displayed on the left in a comma in this field.
properties.settingTooltip: Please enter the items to be displayed on the left in a comma in this field.

properties.name: rightItems
properties.label: Right Items
properties.handlerDescription: Please enter the items to be displayed on the right in a comma in this field.
properties.settingTooltip: Please enter the items to be displayed on the right in a comma in this field.
